  • Method Details

    • baseUrl

      public EventLogClient.Builder baseUrl(String baseUrl)
      Set the base URL for the Event Log API (required)

    • tokenProvider

      public EventLogClient.Builder tokenProvider(TokenProvider tokenProvider)
      Set the token provider for authentication (recommended)

      Use OAuthTokenProvider for OAuth client credentials flow, or TokenProvider.of(String) for static API keys.

      See Also:
      • OAuthTokenProvider

    • apiKey

      @Deprecated public EventLogClient.Builder apiKey(String apiKey)
      Deprecated.
      Use tokenProvider(TokenProvider) with OAuthTokenProvider for production
      Set a static API key for authentication (convenience method)

      This is equivalent to tokenProvider(TokenProvider.of(apiKey)).

      For production, prefer using tokenProvider(TokenProvider) with OAuthTokenProvider.

      Parameters:
      apiKey - The API key

    • applicationId

      public EventLogClient.Builder applicationId(String applicationId)
      Set the default application ID to include in headers

    • connectTimeout

      public EventLogClient.Builder connectTimeout(Duration timeout)
      Set the connection timeout (default: 10 seconds)

    • timeout

      public EventLogClient.Builder timeout(Duration timeout)
      Alias for connectTimeout for simpler API

    • requestTimeout

      public EventLogClient.Builder requestTimeout(Duration timeout)
      Set the per-request timeout (default: 30 seconds)

    • objectMapper

      public EventLogClient.Builder objectMapper(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
      Provide a pre-configured ObjectMapper (recommended for Spring Boot integration)

    • httpClient

      public EventLogClient.Builder httpClient(HttpClient httpClient)

    • maxRetries

      Set maximum retry attempts for failed requests (default: 3)

    • retryDelay

      public EventLogClient.Builder retryDelay(Duration retryDelay)
      Set delay between retries (default: 500ms, increases exponentially)

    • build

      public EventLogClient build()
      Build the EventLogClient
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if baseUrl is not set
